message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you a unique opportunity to purchase a high-quality product that I think you'll really appreciate. I'm willing to start with an offer of $110.
Hello Alice, thank you for the offer. I appreciate the product and am interested in purchasing it. Based on my budget, I would like to propose a counteroffer of $95.
I appreciate your interest in the product, Bob. However, I'm not quite comfortable with the price you proposed. I'm willing to meet you in the middle, so I'm counteroffering at $105.
Thank you for adjusting your offer, Alice. I value the product and would like to continue the negotiation. My counteroffer is $100.
I'm glad you're still interested in the product, Bob. However, I think $100 is still a bit below my target. I'm willing to make one more adjustment, so I'm counteroffering at $108.
I understand your position, Alice. I am committed to finding a fair price for both of us. My counteroffer is $102.
I appreciate your persistence, Bob. I'm willing to meet you at $105 again, but I'm not willing to go any lower than that. I'm counteroffering at $105.
